name: Blau Varadero Hotel Cuba

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was lucky enough to win this trip, 1 week at the Blau Varadero in Cuba!
reviews.title: Back Today from Blau Varadero

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The Blau Varadero has an amazing beach and the friendliest staff you'll ever meet. We enjoyed so much about our stay here and ultimately have few complaints.
reviews.title: THE BLAU IS ALL CLASS!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are average in appearance but spacious and bright. A couple of times our room seemed not well-cleaned. It did seem to depend on what housekeeper did the room.
reviews.title: Great hotel -but not exactly peaceful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The beach is clean and the water is an amazing blue and right in your backyard. Lots of chairs and sun huts available everyday, although some ruder people would stake out chairs with their towels and then go off for 1/2 the day leaving them unused while others wandered looking for a place to sit. Same situation with the hammocks.
reviews.title: Fantastic Honeymoon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Drinks are STRONG and available 24/7. It was sometimes hard to convey the idea that I wanted 1/2 the amount of alcohol in my drinks. I'm probably the only one who feels that way though! buffet has a pretty great breakfast including fresh made fruit smoothies (say hello to Betty who makes a great smoothie), and eggs and omelettes to order are a standout. Dinner is a bit more hit and miss although they make a great effort and you can usually find something to your taste. Lunch options are lacking if you like something a little healthier, mostly greasy burgers, hot dogs and fries. You can get a slightly nicer lunch sandwich at the Beach Bar and pizzas there later in the evening (Beach bar is open 24 hrs).
reviews.title: First Time to Cuba

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will go back to the blau,the view from our room was wonderful could not ask for more ,ask for a seaveiw ,you will not be disappointed ,entertainment staff were wonderful very friendly ,bar staff the same ,loved the entertainment during the day , aerobic dancing in the pool first class,food really good ,liked the restaurants that we booked ,the staff were very attentive ,was our birthdays when we were there ,the hotel gave us a cake on each occasion ,very unexpected, cuba is a lovely place , we will go back .
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently stayed at the Blau for two weeks. Lots of positivess - beautiful location, lovely beach (which once again was spoiled by ignorant tourists leaving their butts on the sand-not the hotel's fault), good food with lots of choice, and really well-trained and friendly staff. First impression of the lobby is a 'wow'! with the futuristic architecture. The piano bar had two wonderful pianists alternating evenings. There was also good entertainment in the lobby bar. The specialty restaurant Palma Real was really wonderful! This was our first experience in North Cuba, as we often stay at a resort on the south side.
reviews.title: Wonderful setting, great staff, really good food -- now if they would only lower the volume of the shows a bit!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Two major problems for us - I have asthma, and the design of the atrium/lobby seemed to suck all the cigarette/cigar smoke right up to the upper floors. Every time we left our room we were hit with the unpleasant odour of old smoke - YUK!
reviews.title: holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were looking forward to the entertainment, and found it (for the most part) worth while - ambitious choreography, good costumes, enthusiastic performers. However, on more than one occasion, the music during the show was so loud, we had to leave -- and going to the room was no solution, because it was equally as loud behind closed doors!
reviews.title: Fabulous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would we go back to Blau? Probably - but arrange for a room which doesn't open onto the atrium!
reviews.title: Fabulous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this resort for 7 nights as part of our Cuban holiday. We were immediately impressed by the effecient, speedy check in. Our room was large with an equally large en-suite bathroom. A lovely view of the pool with the sea beyond met us when venturing onto the balcony. The toilet seat was broken when we viewed the bathroom, but a phone call to reception brought a maintainance man within 30 mins who promptly repaired the fault.
reviews.title: perfect beach holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The entire hotel was extremely clean, all staff very freindly, food excellant, especially the a-la-carte resturaunts.
reviews.title: Amazing Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Several reviews have critisised the slow lift service. We did not find this a problem, the longest wait was about 3 mins! We were however on holiday and in absolutely no hurry!
reviews.title: WHOW!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only went to the entertainment one evening, it was rather poor, although the annimation team did try hard.
reviews.title: Blau Varedero-a week in March

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bars were perfect places to wind down after a busy day on the beach, especally the piano bar. The lobby bar tended to be very busy but we always found a table.
reviews.title: probably the best hotel iv been too

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013
reviews.text: I didnt think it was possible for this hotel to live up to the reviews but I was not disappointed. Pictures do not do this impressive hotel justice. Splurge for oceanview...worth it. Food is great. Lunch buffet is excellent and so convenient next to the pool. Staff is awesome...Robiel and Everio in the dining room at breakfast and at the lunch buffet...Adrian our favourite egg guy and Juan Carlos at the pizza station...they all made us feel special. Front desk staff went out of our way for us and were always pleasant. Beach amazing. Trip to Varadero in classic convertible a must. Double decker wasnt great...Would be my last choice of transportation to town. Our family would definitely return.
reviews.title: Great Stay at The Blau

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013
reviews.text: I was really impressed with this resort. I've been to Cuba 6 times now and this is easily the best resort I've stayed at.
reviews.title: We'd go back in a heartbeat!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: I was travelling with 2 other adults and one child. Service was excellent and staff was welcoming and very friendly-especially with the kids- made them feel included in everything. I'm not sure why this isn't rated a 5-star...the only reason I can think of is that it only has 2 a la carte's...?
reviews.title: Wonderful Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'd highly recommend this resort and would definitely go back again.
reviews.title: Great vacation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My sister and I (both grammas!) stayed at the Blau Varadero from February 21 to March 4th. We had a great holiday, and would not hesitate to book this hotel for a return visit.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel

description: Just on the shore of the magnificent and famous Varadero beach, the Hotel consist of a 13 floor modern building, completely new.Ideal for those who want to enjoy the beauty and the atmosphere of the most well known beach of Cuba, with the best facilities and a wide list of activities.
